name: April Origins
description:
This game is considered NON-CANON in the Brad Dungeon Universe!!!

April Origins is not just your average April game.

Join Julie as she explores the newest attraction in her town. As she explores the dungeon, she meets a new face and uncovers a secret that no one ever knew.

Art and Music:
Cassandra Larkin

Gameplay and Direction:
Sterling Aceto

Made with RPGMAKER
